/*
 * This file is generated using typical-template.
 */
package examples.deep

import examples.deep.DeepModel

/**
 * Generate the content for the template DeepRenderer filled up
 * with the content of the passed models.
 */
object DeepRenderer {

    fun renderTemplate(deepModel: DeepModel): String {
        return """
          |
          |
          |${ deepModel.items.joinToString("") { item ->  """
              |    println("item: ${"$"}item")
              |
          """ } }
          |
          |
        """.trimMargin(marginPrefix = "|")
    }

    fun filePath(deepModel: DeepModel): String {
      return "dummy-dir/deep.txt"
    }
}
